thing-type.description: Scene master 8 button remote<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gtCentral Scene Controller with 8 Buttons supporting long-press capability.<br /&gt<br /&gtKey Features:<br /&gt - Controls up to 8x2 pre-set scenes and<br /&gt - One learn-key setup and simple operation<br /&gt - Report for key pressed 1 time, 2 times, released and held down<br /&gt - Unlimited controlling capability through gateway<br /&gt - Z-Wave Plus compliant<br /&gt - Super thin, elegant design and able to mount to the wall-bracket</p&gt <br /&gt<h2&gtInclusion Information</h2&gt<p&gtInclude device by</p&gt <p&gt- pressing button R (middle button over the battery) + L (right button over the battery)<br /&gt- Press the keys until LED light up</p&gt <br /&gt<h2&gtExclusion Information</h2&gt<p&gtExclude device</p&gt <p&gt- single click to button R (middle button over the battery)</p&gt <p&gtReset to factory default</p&gt <p&gt- Press and keep holding button R for 10 seconds, then triple click</p&gt <br /&gt<h2&gtWakeup Information</h2&gt<p&gtWake up</p&gt <p&gt- single click button W (left button over the battery)</p&gt
